name: Elias The Torch
description:
"Salmon, take this letter with you. Deliver the message to Ivar, The Greedy."

- Elias The Torch

Elias is The Mentor of The Seven Clerics group. Travelling from Lightcaster Village. He doesn't carry any weapon. But he can illuminate a bright halo that can damage his enemies and make them blind. His presence threatens the undeads. None of them dare to open their coffins even just to see his face when he walks near them. Calm, wise, and deadly. Elias, The Torch of Lightcaster Village
